mission.name: Edron City: Trolls
Edron City: Goblins
Paw and Fur - Elite Hunting: Trolls
Paw and Fur - Elite Hunting: Globins
Paw and Fur - Elite Hunting: Crocodiles
Paw and Fur - Elite Hunting: Badgers
Paw and Fur - Elite Hunting: Tarantulas
Paw and Fur - Elite Hunting: Carniphilas
Paw and Fur - Elite Hunting: Stone Golems
Paw and Fur - Elite Hunting: Mammoths
Paw and Fur - Elite Hunting: Gnarlhounds
Paw and Fur - Elite Hunting: Terramites
Paw and Fur - Elite Hunting: Apes
Paw and Fur - Elite Hunting: Thornback Tortoises
Paw and Fur - Elite Hunting: Gargoyles
Paw and Fur - Elite Hunting: Ice Golems
Paw and Fur - Elite Hunting: Quara Scouts
Paw and Fur - Elite Hunting: Mutated Rats
Paw and Fur - Elite Hunting: Ancient Scarabs
Paw and Fur - Elite Hunting: Wyverns
Paw and Fur - Elite Hunting: Lancer Beetles
Paw and Fur - Elite Hunting: Wailing Widows
Paw and Fur - Elite Hunting: Killer Caimans
Paw and Fur - Elite Hunting: Bonebeasts
Paw and Fur - Elite Hunting: Crystal Spiders
Paw and Fur - Elite Hunting: Mutated Tigers
Paw and Fur - Elite Hunting: Underwater Quara
Paw and Fur - Elite Hunting: Giant Spiders
Paw and Fur - Elite Hunting: Werewolves
Paw and Fur - Elite Hunting: Nightmares
Paw and Fur - Elite Hunting: Hellspawns
Paw and Fur - Elite Hunting: High Class Lizards
mission.description: You've already slained |STATE|/800 high class lizards.

mission.name: Paw and Fur - Elite Hunting: Stampors
Paw and Fur - Elite Hunting: Brimstone Bugs
Paw and Fur - Elite Hunting: Mutated Bats
Paw and Fur - Elite Hunting: Hydras
Paw and Fur - Elite Hunting: Serpent Spawns
Paw and Fur - Elite Hunting: Medusas
Paw and Fur - Elite Hunting: Behemoths
Paw and Fur - Elite Hunting: Sea Serpents and Young Sea Serpents
mission.description: You've already slained |STATE|/900 sea serpents and young sea serpents.

mission.name: Paw and Fur - Elite Hunting: Hellhounds
Paw and Fur - Elite Hunting: Ghastly Dragons
Paw and Fur - Elite Hunting: Drakens
Paw and Fur - Elite Hunting: Destroyers
Paw and Fur - Elite Hunting: Undead Dragons
Paw and Fur - Elite Hunting: Demons
Paw and Fur - Elite Hunting: Green Djinns or Efreets
mission.description: You've already slained |STATE|/500 green djinns or efreets.

mission.name: Paw and Fur - Elite Hunting: Blue Djinns or Marids
mission.description: You've already slained |STATE|/500 blue djinns or marids.

mission.name: Paw and Fur - Elite Hunting: Pirates
Paw and Fur - Elite Hunting: Pirates Second
Paw and Fur - Elite Hunting: Minotaurs
Paw and Fur - Elite Hunting: Necromancers and Priestess
mission.description: You've already slained |STATE|/4000 necromancers and priestess.

mission.name: Paw and Fur - Elite Hunting: Necromancers and Priestess Second
mission.description: You've already slained |STATE|/1000 necromancers and priestess.

mission.name: Ask for Mission

missionstate.description: Go to Henricus and ask him for a mission.
Go to Henricus and ask him for a mission.

mission.name: Mission 1: Interrogation

missionstate.description: Your mission is to investigate the 5 guards in Thais regarding the Heretic behavior. Tim, Kulag, Grof, Miles and Walter are their names. If you do well you see a holy sprite on you.
Get back to Thais and report your mission to Henricus.

mission.name: Mission 2: Eclipse

missionstate.description: Henricus tells you to get The Witches' Grimoire, he sends you to Femor Hills where you can fly to the witches' mountain, say Eclipse to Uzon and he will take you there. Use the vial of holy water that he gives you on the big cauldron and open the chest to your left, then bring the witches' grimoire to Henricus.
Find the witches' grimoire and bring it to Henricus.

mission.name: Mission 3: Vampire Hunt

missionstate.description: Henricus wants you to find the Dwarfish Vampire Hunter, Storkus, located west of the Dwarf Bridge. It's good idea bring your 20 Vampire Dusts with you to save some time.
Go Back to Storkus the Dwarf and ask for Mission.

Now Storkus wants you to kill a vampire lord, The Count in the Green Claw Swamp, The Count is located near to the Blood Herb Quest. When you go down the hole walk to the right and go down the next stairs. You'll see a buried coffin surrounded by 3 counters. To summon The Count, you must use the coffin in the center of the room. Kill it and bring The Ring of the Count to Storkus.
Go Back to Storkus the Dwarf and ask for Mission.
Return to Henricus and tell him that you finished your job here.
Get back to Thais and report your mission to Henricus.

mission.name: Mission 4: The Haunted Ruin

missionstate.description: Henricus will gave you a Special Flask (vial of holy water). Go to Liberty Bay and use the vial on an old house. Use this vial of holy water on that spot to drive out the evil being.
Get back to Thais and report your mission to Henricus.

mission.name: Mission 5: Essential Gathering

missionstate.description: Ask Henricus for a mission.
Henricus wants 20 Demonic Essences, just give them.
Now ask for outfit and he will give you the Demon Hunter Outfits without addons.

mission.name: Mission 6: The Demon Ungreez

missionstate.description: Ask Henricus for a mission.
Henricus wants you to kill a demon called Ungreez. Head to Edron Hero Cave and go down a few levels.
Get back to Thais and report your mission to Henricus.

mission.name: Mission 7: The Shadow Nexus

missionstate.description: Ask Henricus for a mission.

Your mission is to go to the Demon Forge and slay seven of The Ruthless Seven Minions. The Demon Forge is located in the Edron Hero Cave, through a portal after the Vampire Shield Quest. Upon entry you will immediately be ambushed by Hellfire Fighters, Fire Devils and Fire Elementals.
Get back to Thais and report your mission to Henricus.
Now ask to Henricus for a outfit. He will give you the 2nd addon of the Demon Hunter Outfits.
You have Complete The Inquisition Quest!

mission.name: Dwarven Armor Quest

missionstate.description: Sam sends you to see Kroox in Kazordoon to get a special dwarven armor. Just tell him, his old buddy Sam is sending you.
You have the permission to retrive a dwarven armor from the mines. The problem is, some giant spiders made the tunnels where the storage is their new home.
You have Complete Dwarven Armor Quest!

mission.name: Barbarian Test 1: Barbarian Booze

missionstate.description: Give Sven a honeycomb. For each honeycomb you will be allowed 20 sips.
Now drink from the bucket until you drink 10 sips in a row without passing out
You have Complete this Test!

mission.name: Barbarian Test 2: The Bear Hugging

missionstate.description: Sven gave you a Mead Horn. Fill it with mead from the bucket behind Sven (brown contents) and then proceed to the sleeping bear. The bear is inside a small ice cave in the north. Use the full mead horn on the bear so it becomes unconscious, then use the bear to hug it.
You hugging the bear! Go tell Sven that you hugged the bear!
You have Complete this Test!

mission.name: Barbarian Test 3: The Mammoth Pushing

missionstate.description: Go to the north-west of Svargrond and find the Mammoth. Drink your three mugs of mead, stand in front of the Mammoth and push it. Just use it...
You pushed the Mammoth! Go tell Sven that you pushed the Mammoth!
You have Complete this Test! You can now become a citizen of Svargrond!

mission.name: Hunter Outfit Quest

missionstate.description: Elane sends you to Liberty Bay to bring her the Crossbow from the Cult.
Bring Elane 100 pieces of lizard leather and 100 pieces of red dragon leather.
Bring Elane 5 enchanted chicken wings.
Bring Elane one piece of royal steel, draconian steel and hell steel each.
You got the Outfit!

mission.name: Druid Outfit Quest

missionstate.description: Ceiron sends you to collect a sample of the blooming Griffinclaw.
Ask Ceiron for task.

take Ceirons waterskin and try to fill it with water from this special trickle. In the mountains between Ankrahmun and Tiquanda are two hydra lairs. It is important that you take the water directly from the trickle, not from the pond
Ask Ceiron for task.
Bring Ceiron 100 ounces of demon dust.
Ask Ceiron for task.
The last mission is to find and retrieve Ceiron's Wolf Tooth Chain lost inside the Orc Fortress.
Ask Ceiron for Faolan.
Head over to Cormaya, find A Majestic Warwolf's Cave and ask her about an addon.
You got the Outfit!

mission.name: Knight Outfit Quest

missionstate.description: First you must collect 100 Behemoth Fangs by looting or Skinning Behemoth's. Bring them to Gregor in Thais.
Gregor send you to retrieve the helmet of Ramsay the Reckless found in deeper Banuta
Bring Gregor a Flask of Warrior's Sweat.
Bring Gregor one piece of royal steel.
Gregor send you to Sam to adorn your helmet.
You got the Outfit!

mission.name: Mage Outfit Quest (Wand)

missionstate.description: You found Angelina in a Prison. She told you a secret: Lynda in Thais can create a blessed wand. Greet her from Angelina, maybe she will aid you.
Lynda send you to bring her a sample of all five wands and five rods (Snakebite, Moonlight, Necrotic, Terra, Hailstorm, Vortex, Dragonbreath, Decay, Cosmic Energy and Inferno)
Bring Lynda 10 ounces of magic sulphur
Bring Lynda the Necromancer's soul stone
Bring Lynda 20 ankhs now to complete the ritual.
You got the Outfit!

mission.name: Citizen Outfit Quest (Feather Hat)

missionstate.description: Bring Hanna in Thais 100 chicken feathers, 50 honeycombs and a legion helmet to get the hat
You got the Outfit!

mission.name: Citizen Outfit Quest (Backpack)

missionstate.description: Bring Lubo in northeast of Thais 100 minotaur leather to get the Backpack
You got the Outfit!

mission.name: Ask for Mission

missionstate.description: Ask Palimuth for a mission.
Ask Palimuth for a mission.

mission.name: Mission 01: Something Rotten

missionstate.description: Palimuth asked you to help with some sewer malfunctions. You will need a Crowbar, there are 4 places where you need to go marked with an X on your map.
You cleaned 1 pipe from the garbage.
You cleaned 2 pipes from the garbage.
You cleaned 3 pipes from the garbage.
You cleaned 4 pipes from the garbage.
You cleaned all pipes from the garbage! Go back to Palimuth and ask for mission.

mission.name: Mission 02: Watching the Watchmen

missionstate.description: You have to find all 7 guards and give a report them.
You report 1 of 7 guards
You report 2 of 7 guards
You report 3 of 7 guards
You report 4 of 7 guards
You report 5 of 7 guards
You report 6 of 7 guards
You report 7 of 7 guards! Go back to Palimuth and ask for mission.

mission.name: Mission 03: Death to the Deathbringer

missionstate.description: Get the notes in Palimuths room and read them. Talk to Palimuth again when you've read the notes.
talk to Azerus the Yalahari in the city centre to get your next mission.
Get the notes behind the Yalahari and read them. Talk to Azerus again and ask him for mission when you've read the notes.
Ask Palimuth for mission.
First you will need to kill the three plague bearers and then get The Alchemists' Formulas. When this have been done head back to either Palimuth (good side) or Yalahari (Azerus) (bad side).
Ask Azerus the Yalahari for a mission.

mission.name: Mission 04: Good to be Kingpin

missionstate.description: Ask Palimuth for mission.

For this mission you are asked to go to the Trade Quarter and negotiate or threaten Mr. West. Once again you will gain access to the mechanism although if you choose to help Palimuth you should go through the sewers.
You decided to help Palimuth, report him your mission.
You decided to help Azerus, report him your mission.
Get back to Azerus and report him your mission.
Ask Azerus for a mission.

mission.name: Mission 05: Food or Fight

missionstate.description: Ask Palimuth for mission.
On this mission you are asked to find a druid by the name of Tamerin, on the Arena Quarter. You now have permission to use the gates mechanism.
The first is to bring Tamerin a flask of Animal Cure, you can buy this from Siflind on Nibelor.
now you have to kill Morik the Gladiator and bring his helmet to Tamerin as proof.

Report back to Tamerin as he will listen to your request and you can now make your choice: Cattle for Palimuth (good side), Warbeasts for Yalahari (Azerus) (bad side). Then report the one you decided your mission.
You decided to help Palimuth, report him your mission.
You decided to help Azerus, report him your mission.
Ask Azerus for a mission.

mission.name: Mission 06: Frightening Fuel

missionstate.description: Ask Palimuth for mission.

Yalahari (Azerus) orders you to travel to the Cemetery Quarter and find the Strange Carving. He gives you a Ghost Charm and tells you to charge it with the tormented souls of the ghosts there to be used as an energy source. Palimuth wants the Charged Ghost Charm in order to free those souls. You can new use the Cemetery Quarter mechanism now. Go to the big building in the Cemetery Quarter and use the Ghost Charm on the Strange Carving at the back of the room.
Good side: Go to Palimuth, ask him about your mission, and hand in the charm. Bad side: Ask about your mission to Yalahari (Azerus) and give it back.
Get back to Azerus and report him your mission.
Ask Azerus for a mission.

mission.name: Mission 07: A Fishy Mission

missionstate.description: Ask Palimuth for mission.

Bad side: Yalahari (Azerus) will send you for a new mission to go to the Sunken Quarter and kill the Quara Leaders, Inky, Splasher and Sharptooth. Good side: Rather than fighting any Quara leaders Palimuth will instead send you to find the cause for the Quaras aggressive behavior. Find Maritima and talk to her about the Quara and she will explain what their problem is.
Get back to Palimuth and report him your mission.
You killed the Quarabosses. Ask Azerus for a mission.
Ask Azerus for a mission.

mission.name: Mission 08: Dangerous Machinations

missionstate.description: Ask Palimuth for mission.

Bad side: For this mission the Yalahari requests you go to the Factory Quarter and find a pattern crystal, which will be used to supply weapons to help take control of the city. Good side: Palimuth will send you there to use the crystal to supply food for the city.
Get back to Azerus and report him your mission.
Ask Azerus for a mission.

mission.name: Mission 09: Decision

missionstate.description: You now need to decide between supporting Palimuth or the Yalahari's goal. To choose Palimuth's good side go to him, and simply ask him for a mission mission. Likewise, to join the Yalahari (Azerus) (bad side) go to him and say the same.
you already decided!

mission.name: Mission 10: The Final Battle

missionstate.description: Palimuth told you that a circle of Yalahari is planning some kind of ritual. They plan to create a portal for some powerful demons and to unleash them in the city to 'purge' it once and for all.
The entrance to their inner sanctum has been opened for you. Be prepared for a HARD battle! Better gather some friends to assist you.
Report back to whichever principal you have chosen to help and you will receive Yalaharian Outfits.
You got the access to the reward room. Choose carefully which reward you pick as you can only take one item.
You have Complete the Quest!

mission.name: Mission 1: Trophy

missionstate.description: Your first mission for becoming a recognized trader is to bring the traveling salesman Rashid a Deer Trophy.
You have completed this mission. Talk with Rashid to continue.

mission.name: Mission 2: Delivery

missionstate.description: Your mission is to get the package from Willard the weapon dealer at Edron.
Willard forgot to pick it up from Snake Eye at Outlaw Camp. So he wants you to go and pick it up from Snake Eye.
Take the package just next door.
Now bring back the package to Rashid.
You have completed this mission. Talk with Rashid to continue.

mission.name: Mission 3: Cheese

missionstate.description: Rashid wants you to pick his special order from Miraia in Darashia. But you have to be quick, Scarab cheese can rot really fast in high temperature.
Now quickly bring back the Scarab cheese to Rashid.
You have completed this mission. Talk with Rashid to continue.

mission.name: Mission 4: Vase

missionstate.description: Rashid have ordered a special elven vase from Briasol in Ab'Dendriel. He asks you to buy it from Briasol and bring it back.\nBut you should be carefully, since the vase is very fragile.
Now carefully bring the vase back to Rashid.
You have completed this mission. Talk with Rashid to continue.

mission.name: Mission 5: Make a deal

missionstate.description: This time, Rashid is testing your trading skills to buy a Crimson Sword from Uzgod. But it have to be less than 400 gold coins and the quality has to be perfect.
Now bring the sword back to Rashid.
You have completed this mission. Talk with Rashid to continue.

mission.name: Mission 6: Goldfish

missionstate.description: Rashid wants you to bring him a Goldfish Bowl.
You have completed this mission. Talk with Rashid to continue.

mission.name: Mission 7: Declare

missionstate.description: Rashid has declare you as one of his recognized traders, and now you are able to trade with him anytime..

mission.name: Djinn leader: Secret Greeting

missionstate.description: Now you are ready to meet one of the Djinn leaders. Remeber they only answer, if you greet them with the secret word: DJANNI'HAH

mission.name: Efreet: Method - Joined

missionstate.description: You have joined the Efreet Faction. Ubaid wants you to meet with their general Baa'leal.

mission.name: Efreet: Mission 1 - The Supply Thief

missionstate.description: Baa'leal want you find the supply thief in Carlin.
Find Partos in Thais and ask about Prison, Ankrahmun and Supplies.
Head back to Baa'leal and report about the supply thief.
Baa'leal wants you to speak with Alesar about a new mission.

mission.name: Efreet: Mission 2 - The Tear of Daraman

missionstate.description: Alesar wants you to sneak into Ashta'daramai and to steal the gemstone.
You have founded the gemstone, head back to Alesar.
Alesar wants you to speak with Malor about a new mission.

mission.name: Efreet: Mission 3 - Orc Fortress

missionstate.description: Malor want you to retrieve a lamp from the Orc King in Ulderek's Rock.
Now you need to, sneak into the Blue Djinn fortress, and place it in Gabel's personal bedchamber. Go to the secret entrance to the Blue Djinn fortress, and take the stairs all the way to the top.
You successfully changed the lamp, now sneak out and report to Malor.
You have completed all missions. Malor allows you now to trade with his people.

mission.name: Marid: Method - Joined

missionstate.description: You have joined the Marid Faction. Ubaid wants you to meet with Bo'ques.

mission.name: Marid: Mission 1 - Cookbook

missionstate.description: Bo'ques wants you to find a cookbook with exotic recipes.
Bring the cookbook to Bo'ques and he will reward you for your help.
Continue your mission with Fa'hradin.

mission.name: Marid: Mission 2 - Spy Report

missionstate.description: Fa'hradin wants you retrive a spy report from their spy which like cheese in the Green Djinn fortress. Also he clearly said to remeber this word: PIEDPIPER
Bring the spy report back to Fa'hradin.
Continue your mission with Gabel.

mission.name: Marid: Mission 3 - Orc Fortress

missionstate.description: Gabel wants you travel to Ulderek's Rock and talk with the King of Orcs.
Now you need to, sneak into the Green Djinn fortress, and place it in Malor's personal bedchamber. Go to the secret entrance to the Green Djinn fortress, and take the stairs all the way to the top.
You successfully changed the lamp, now sneak out and report to Gabel.
You have completed all missions. Gabel allows you now to trade with his people.

mission.name: Example Mission 1

missionstate.description: Example description 1
Example description 2
Example description 3

mission.name: Example Mission 2

missionstate.description: Example description 1
Example description 2
